item.title: Nightmare
item.description: You are being held close. Cradled like a baby by a gigantic figure in dark robes. Held tight to it’s chest you cannot see it’s face. You are not comforted by this action despite the apparent kindness of the gesture. The figure’s skin is cold and the it’s movement is stiff and emotionless. A harsh purple light pervades the room growing in intensity… then you wake up.
